languages.text: "Чего ты хочешь? Спасти его, или успокоить свою совесть? Ведь он оказался здесь из-за того, что слушал твои проповеди".
"What is it you truly want? To save him? Or to ease your own conscience? He is here because he listened to your sermons, after all."
languages.original_text: "Чего ты хочешь? Спасти его, или успокоить свою совесть? Ведь он оказался здесь из-за того, что слушал твои проповеди".

traits.locale_text: "What is it you truly want? To save him? Or to ease your own conscience? He is here because he listened to your sermons, after all."
"What is it you truly want? To save him? Or to make amends? Do you not think it is too late for that?"
"What is it you truly want? To save him? Or to ease your own conscience? He is here because he listened to your sermons, after all."
"What is it you truly want? To save him? Or to ease your own conscience? He is here because he listened to your sermons, after all."
"What is it you truly want? To save him? Or to ease your own conscience? He is here because he listened to your sermons, after all."
"What is it you truly want? To save him? Or to ease your own conscience? He is here because he listened to your sermons, after all."

languages.text: « C'est vraiment ce que vous voulez ? Le sauver ? Ou vous voulez seulement apaiser votre conscience ? S'il en est là, c'est parce qu'il a écouté vos sermons, après tout. »
languages.original_text: "What is it you truly want? To save him? Or to ease your own conscience? He is here because he listened to your sermons, after all."

traits.locale_text: « C'est vraiment ce que vous voulez ? Le sauver ? Ou vous voulez seulement apaiser votre conscience ? S'il en est là, c'est parce qu'il a écouté vos sermons, après tout. »

languages.text: “你究竟想做什么？你是想救他，还是为了安慰你自己的良心？毕竟，他之所以会来这里，就是因为听信了你的布道。”
languages.original_text: "What is it you truly want? To save him? Or to ease your own conscience? He is here because he listened to your sermons, after all."

traits.locale_text: “你究竟想做什么？你是想救他，还是为了安慰你自己的良心？毕竟，他之所以会来这里，就是因为听信了你的布道。”

languages.text: 「君の本当の望みは何だ？彼を救いたいのか？それとも自分の良心の呵責から逃げたいのか？彼がここにいるのは、君の説教を聞いたからなんだぞ」
languages.original_text: "What is it you truly want? To save him? Or to ease your own conscience? He is here because he listened to your sermons, after all."

traits.locale_text: 「君の本当の望みは何だ？彼を救いたいのか？それとも自分の良心の呵責から逃げたいのか？彼がここにいるのは、君の説教を聞いたからなんだぞ」

languages.text: "Was wollt Ihr wirklich? Ihn retten? Oder Euer eigenes Gewissen beruhigen? Er ist nur hier, weil er auf Eure Predigten gehört hat."
languages.original_text: "What is it you truly want? To save him? Or to ease your own conscience? He is here because he listened to your sermons, after all."

traits.locale_text: "Was wollt Ihr wirklich? Ihn retten? Oder Euer eigenes Gewissen beruhigen? Er ist nur hier, weil er auf Eure Predigten gehört hat."

languages.text: «¿Qué es lo que quiere realmente? ¿Salvarle? ¿O limpiar su conciencia? Al fin y al cabo, si está aquí es porque sus sermones le convencieron».
languages.original_text: "What is it you truly want? To save him? Or to ease your own conscience? He is here because he listened to your sermons, after all."

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué es lo que quiere realmente? ¿Salvarle? ¿O limpiar su conciencia? Al fin y al cabo, si está aquí es porque sus sermones le convencieron».

languages.text: "Asıl istediğin ne? Onu kurtarmak mı? Yoksa kendi vicdanını rahatlatmak mı? Buraya senin vaazlarını dinlediği için geldi sonuçta."
languages.original_text: "What is it you truly want? To save him? Or to ease your own conscience? He is here because he listened to your sermons, after all."

traits.locale_text: "Asıl istediğin ne? Onu kurtarmak mı? Yoksa kendi vicdanını rahatlatmak mı? Buraya senin vaazlarını dinlediği için geldi sonuçta."
